channel.title: 🏢 University of Science and Technology Beijing on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of Science and Technology Beijing on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Pedestrian-Centric 3D Pre-collision Pose and Shape Estimation from Dashcam Perspective
item.description: New Pedestrian-Vehicle Collision Pose dataset (PVCP) and Pose Estimation Network (PPSENet) improve pedestrian pre-collision pose estimation from dashcam video.
